articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy update improves Xbox Series X|S performance and more - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Avalanche Software has rolled out its first update for open world adventure game Hogwarts Legacy, which fixes several bugs and improves performance on Xbox Series X|S.
